item.title: Ionic 2 Timeout Http
item.description: should add this : import 'rxjs/add/operator/timeout' this.http.post('myUrl', MyData, {headers: Myheaders}) .timeout(3000, new Error('timeout exceeded')) .map(res => res.json()) .subscribe( data => this.ret = data, error => console.debug('ERROR', error), () => console.log('END') ); then it can work.
